definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: gather together, roll up (Ar. qafida wind turban snugly; Aram. [[קְפַד]], qpad, Ithpe. be drawn in, together; also [[קוּפְדָא]], quwpdo0, porcupine; so Ar. (d) qunfud-un (cf. Lag:BN 182), Eth. q=infz:);—Pf. 1 S. [[קִפַּדְתִּי]] Is 38:12 I have rolled up, like a weaver, my life (i.e. finished it; Buhl:Lex 13 [[תָּ]]- [of ´[[י]]:], but 3 ms. foll. of ´[[י]]:).
